text: Na'ankure tagriku huno mago mofavrea tamigahiankino, ana mofavrema efore'ma hanigeno'a, agri afunte kamania me'nenkeno kegava hugahie. Ana hu'neankino agima ahesnazana, Knare zantfa huno Antahintahi tamisia nere nehu'za, Hankavenentake Anumzane nehu'za, Manivava Nafatie nehu'za, Tarimpa fruzamofo Kinie hu'za hugahaze.
